Additional 1mt ifo per day in port for boiler in cold weather.
ABOUT IS UNDERSTOOD TO MEAN 0.5KNOTS DOWNWARDS ALLOWANCE THE SPEED AND 5% UPWARDS ALLOWANCE INTHE CONSUMPTION.
